mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, create_id, update_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{createId}, #{updateId} )
mapper.select: select user_idx AS userIdx, user_id AS id, user_name AS name, user_email AS email, use_yn AS useYn from tb_user where user_idx = #{userIdx}
